meanings.definition: A location where a house is built.
meanings.sent1: The new neighborhood has spacious homesites for families to build their dream houses.
meanings.sent2: The real estate agent showed us different homesites with beautiful views of the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The homesites in the countryside are so peaceful that even the birds envy them.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, finding a quiet homesite is like discovering a hidden oasis.
meanings.sent5: The homesites by the lake offer a serene retreat from the busy city life.

meanings.definition: The area of land on which a home is situated.
meanings.sent1: The homesites in the neighborhood are well-maintained and spacious.
meanings.sent2: Each homesite in the community has its unique charm and character.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel made the homesite under the tree its cozy little hideaway.
meanings.sent4: The homesite at the top of the hill commands a breathtaking view of the entire valley.
meanings.sent5: The homesite near the river is prone to flooding during heavy rains.
